name: Phantom Breaker: Omnia
overview: Phantom Breaker Omnia is a fighting video game developed by MAGES. and Game Loop and published by Rocket Panda Games. The game serves as the latest update from Phantom Breaker: Extra. Expanding with further gameplay re-balancing, all characters readily available with the addition of two new characters, Maestra and Artifactor, a remixed soundtrack with the option to play with the original music, dual-audio support with English and Japanese voice-overs, and both stories from the original Phantom Breaker and Extra.
